content.text:
# Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Supporting Actor

| year2            = 2022
| holder           = Nasir Uddin Khan
| most_awards      = Fazlur Rahman Babu(5 wins)
| award2_type      = First winner
| award2_winner    = Farooque (1975)
| website          =
}}
Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Supporting Actor () is the highest award for actors in a supporting role in Bangladesh. It was awarded up to now 47 times from 1975  until 2022 . The actor most often awarded is Fazlur Rahman Babu.
